description: Quest Water Global, Inc. operates as a water technology company in Canada. It provides solutions that address the shortage of clean drinking water. The company develops AQUAtap, a proprietary community drinking water system that is a self-contained water purification system; and WEPS, a proprietary water extraction and purification system that produces clean drinking water from humidity in the atmosphere. It serves customers in North America, Latin America, the Caribbean and Africa, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, and the Republic of Angola. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is based in North Vancouver, Canada.
